text: The men's 400 metres hurdles event at the 2019 African Games was held on 28 and 29 August in Rabat. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:left" |- align="center" | width=200 bgcolor=gold|Gold||width=200 bgcolor=silver|Silver|| width=200 bgcolor=CC9966|Bronze |- |Abdelmalik Lahoulou |Bienvenu Sawadogo |Mohamed Amine Touati |} ==Results== ===Heats=== Qualification: First 2 in each heat (Q) and the next 2 fastest (q) advanced to the final. {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
